When a master incident is resolved and closed, all linked incidents are closed automatically.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When a service desk agent escalates an interaction to a new Incident, the support portal provides the following options:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Relate to the existing incident – the difference from the master incident mechanism is that in this case all related incidents and interactions are not closed automatically and require individual review in every case.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Relate to a known error – in this case the interaction is closed, and an appropriate comment related to the existing known error is sent to the user.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"New Incident – a general case for all new incidents.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/8ac3eb2a-749e-4524-b65c-30013353c9dc/image2016-9-2%2010:47:2.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":558,\"height\":247.00000000000003}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"By default, all new incidents are assigned to the Service Desk.
